blogPost.excerpt: Ever spent hours training ML models only to have them crash and burn in production? ZenML is here to help. Track metadata, compare results, and scale to the cloud. It’s open-source, extensible, and integrates with battle-tested MLOps tooling off-the-shelf.
blogPost.body: Ever spent hours training ML models only to have them crash and burn in production? ZenML is here to help. Track metadata, compare results, and scale to the cloud. It’s open-source, extensible, and integrates with battle-tested MLOps tooling off-the-shelf.
blogPost.title: ZenML - Create reproducible machine learning pipelines
blogPost.author: David Aronchick

localize.description: 有没有花了几个小时训练ML模型，结果却让它们在生产中崩溃和烧毁？ZenML在这里提供帮助。跟踪元数据、比较结果并扩展到云。它是开源的、可扩展的，并且与现成的久经考验的MLOPS工具集成在一起。
localize.tagline: 创建可重现的机器学习管道

localize.description: 有沒有花了幾個小時訓練ML模型，結果卻讓它們在生產中崩潰和燒燬？ZenML在這裏提供幫助。跟蹤元數據、比較結果並擴展到雲。它是開源的、可擴展的，並且與現成的久經考驗的MLOPS工具集成在一起。
localize.tagline: 創建可重現的機器學習管道

previous.excerpt: Help your friends get a job by embedding a widget on your website where you point visitors to your friends for jobs that you're not available for. Create your widget in the online generator and embed it on your website using an iframe. It's as simple as that.
previous.title: Referrer - Painlessly refer your friends for jobs

localize.description: 通过在你的网站上嵌入一个小工具来帮助你的朋友找到一份工作，在那里你可以把访问者引导到你的朋友那里，寻找你找不到的工作。在在线生成器中创建您的小部件，并使用IFRAME将其嵌入到您的网站上。就这么简单。
localize.tagline: 毫不费力地推荐你的朋友找工作

localize.description: 通過在你的網站上嵌入一個小工具來幫助你的朋友找到一份工作，在那裏你可以把訪問者引導到你的朋友那裏，尋找你找不到的工作。在在線生成器中創建您的小部件，並使用IFRAME將其嵌入到您的網站上。就這麼簡單。
localize.tagline: 毫不費力地推薦你的朋友找工作

next.excerpt: In the information age, access to global networking is a basic human right. We made the Abacus because the world deserves an affordable & biodegradable PC that is made with the same care and craftsmanship as a Mac.
next.title: The Abacus - Affordable and biodegradable PC

localize.description: 在信息时代，使用全球网络是一项基本人权。我们制造算盘是因为这个世界理应拥有一台价格合理、可生物降解的PC，它的制造工艺和工艺与Mac一样。
localize.tagline: 价格实惠、可生物降解的PC

localize.description: 在信息時代，使用全球網絡是一項基本人權。我們製造算盤是因爲這個世界理應擁有一臺價格合理、可生物降解的PC，它的製造工藝和工藝與Mac一樣。
localize.tagline: 價格實惠、可生物降解的PC
